Row.Text: Honorary Doctor, Founder of the Friendship Club

With help of their Princess Knight, Landosol leaders can get their unique "Union Brust" abilities, enabling bonuses including military advantages. In Yuni's view, all kinds of knowledge are equally of great value, and science can be developed without ignoring culture.

Yuni's Campus district and Theater Square district can provide [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture at the same time. Another way for them to gather [ICON_Science] Science is to put [ICON_GreatWork_Writing] Writing Great Work in their Library. Their Library building itself also provides a unique approach for them to gain [ICON_GreatWriter] Great Writer Points. With Guildhouse building, they can receive unique bonuses from the guild that their leader is in. Besides, Yuni leading Landosol can build an elite military force with their Philosophy of Cognition and Development unique ability if they have to war.
Civiopedia article has not been translated yet.

Civiopedia article has not been translated yet.
Civiopedia article has not been translated yet.
Civiopedia article has not been translated yet.
Unknown, tens of thousands to millions or so
There are still truths to discover even in this world full of lies!
Oh, great. In fact, I was looking for a suitable way to request so.
What do you mean? Is this an old-fashioned joke?
It is important for us to care for each other. Suppose you're leaving us exploring dangerously without any support, what would happen?
I'm surprised that our abrupt informal request is considered carefully. You are so kind.
I'm not a threatening demon. You could decide whatever you want.
So much for playing. Now it's time to learn.
Thank you for them. Well, I feel so sorry as it looks like that we are demanding gifts.
Don't be so shy, just receive gifts from our delegation. We don't know your preference, so it would be great if it pleases you.
Shut up, tyrant. It is your people's voice that we want to hear.
Your reactionary actions somewhat reminded me of old days. Perhaps you are an antithesis of the forming consensus of modern values. (Denounces You)
I'm Yuni. Though I seem to be a little bit delayed in growth, it's possible that I'm older than you. Just call me senior with respect and friendliness, junior.
We have a city nearby. Would you like to visit? We could show you documents and discoveries that intellectuals desire.
We are gathering facts, customs and folklores nearby your country. To be straight, I mean, could you tell me of your capital?
Preferring emotion to utility, that's what we call "romance". You are recognized as an honorable scholar of arts by me.
I'm often in conflict with dogmatic academics. I really hope we are not going to be in such a situation.
Would you like to form an alliance, my companion?
It has always been an idea of us Yuni-chan's that we shall coexist peacefully and friendly. We agree.
We are still not giving up.
I have had a clear understanding of your strength, so let's end this war and make it a little blemish on historical records.
I'm flattered by your arrival. We are willing to open border and provide support for your army.
I cannot agree. Are you an old fogey too stubborn to find an alternative route?
We shall not limit our research in our border, we need to study from a wider perspective. Will you allow us to cross through your territory?
By the way, junior. Would you like to perform some critical actions to defuse the border clash between us? For example, moving your army away.
How do you think: have I contributed something to this world? Please allow me to remember your name as a souvenir I can take to my afterlife.
You have the right to choose.

Friendly to those civilizations that are leading in [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Culture] Culture. Dislikes civilizations that are leading in [ICON_Science] Science but lacking in [ICON_Culture] Culture.
(You are leading both in Science and Culture)
Yuni is pleased with your Science and Culture
(Your cultural development can't match science one)
Yuni is disappointed you have little culture
+10 [ICON_Bombard] Bombard Strength vs. land and naval units.
I'm not "like" a mature girl, I am mature!
It would be cruel of me to leave you all alone with no friends. Since you're so keen on it, I'll let you join in.
You are unaccountably solicitous, and that makes you suspicious. You are definitely dangerous and suspicious.
I thought you were suspicious and creep though... For the moment I suppose you're respectable. So... Let us declare our friendship.
Indeed, it looks childish to ask someone to be our friend... But this is because... Well...
I mean, not that I need you to be our friends... But it feels a little disappointing... Just a tiny little bit...
E- Enemies are coming this way?! I might actually be able to do this!
I can definitely defeat you... I have become able to eat bell peppers, perform back hip circles, and even grew higher!
I'm so glad you brought gifts for me. Thank you for the treat!
If you really want to speak to me, show me some proof that you aren't suspicious.
We have sent you a delegation with gifts of fine made cupcakes and other desserts. They are specialties that we are proud of, and are really delicious!
I thought you were respectable for a moment, but now you look definitely immoral and suspicious.
You should be ashamed for being a despicable leader. (Denounces You)
I am Kyoka. Now that I think about it, sneaking around and following me... That's very suspicious. Maybe you're actually a suspicious creep after all?!
Let us visit our city nearby. Although... Our people aren't very welcoming to outsiders, so you might be in trouble there.
I should not tell a suspicious creep where my capital is. But if you give me a map showing yours, maybe I will feel you are not quite as bad as I thought.
I'm sorry for calling you some kind of suspicious creep. You're a surprisingly good person.
You're very persistent. How can I run into a creep like this... Stay away from me.
Would you like to form an alliance?
Stay away from my borders. I will call my army!
W- weird. That's not how things should be... Seems that I should learn more...
If it will really help you, I suppose I can't say no.
I might be just a kid, but that doesn't mean I'll believe any old nonsense!

Tries to build up [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Production] Production and win a Science Victory. Likes civilizations who pose no threat. Dislikes civilizations with strong militaries or ones with nearby cities.

With help of their Princess Knight, Landosol leaders can get their unique "Union Brust" abilities, enabling bonuses including military advantages. Kyoka receives a large amount of [ICON_Science] Science and [ICON_Production] Production from water and Campases, making her quite a model in the Space Race.

City planning for Kyoka is unique. They needs to build Campuses and deploy ranged units near Coasts or Rivers so that they can fully utilize their unique abilities to protect themselves and win the game. With Guildhouse building, they can receive unique bonuses from the guild that their leader is in. With additional [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Production] Production and free technologies granted by building a Spaceport, there is no doubt that the most suitable victory path for Kyoka is Science Victory.
+1 [ICON_Range] Range when adjacent to a River or Coast.
+{1_num} [ICON_Science] Science from the adjacent Coast tile(s).
First you simmer,[NEWLINE]then boil up hot;[NEWLINE]keep that rice[NEWLINE]snug in the pot.
I, together with nature, will be your strength.
I really appreciate your kindness, but pardon me for declining you as we know little about you.
It is fortunate for me to be able to cooperate with great leaders likes you, so please accept our friendship.
Let me, a guide, support you with my full strength.
I sincerely apologize if I frustrated you.
You are still intending war? So I will stop you here!
Please leave my people! Spirits, grant me power to dispel evils!
It is precious enough that you are keeping peace with us, and I am grateful for receiving such additional gifts from you.
My delegations have sent fruits, traditional cuisines and other local products in mountain villages for you to taste. I humbly wonder if you like them.
If it is for my people's living, I am willing to sacrifice all without sparing despite your calumniation.
Your way of rule is so immature that I am afraid you are not capable of being a leader! (Denounces You)
I am Kokkoro, a guide sent by Ameth. I will protect my people, from morning till night, from the cradle to the grave, for it is my sworn duty and calling.
We have a city nearby. It is so complicated that it is easy to get lost there. Let me guide you to visit it.
Thank you from the bottom of my heart.
Though I saw it is recorded in documentations, I have never seen your capital with my own eyes. Let us talk about tales of past events in our capitals respectively.
May I do something for you?
As a nature dweller, I love birds, insects and all kinds of creatures. You are so kind and gentle.
Artifacts and crowds are everywhere - so exhausting.
Spirits are wishing us to form an alliance.
It would be a dereliction of duty for me as a guide if your troops are hurt at my borders. Please move them away.
Apologies to all my people. I felt so painfully that I'm deficient in strength...
It cannot be better to make deals with leaders like you.

Tries to build up [ICON_Faith] Faith. Builds National Parks, doesn't clear features, plants Woods. Likes civilizations that plant Woods or found National Parks. Dislikes civilizations that clear features.
Kokkoro is watching your treatment of the natural world
Kokkoro likes civs who respect the environment
Member of Gourmet Edifice, Miko of Ameth

With help of their Princess Knight, Landosol leaders can get their unique "Union Brust" abilities, enabling bonuses including military advantages. As a pure white miko protecting nature, Kokkoro in her Princess Form receives great power from charming environment, and guide her people to victory.

Appeal is essential for Princess Kokkoro. They build cities near high appeal tiles to get extra yields from Preserve districts and unit healing that Aurora Sanctuary unique ability provides. They can earn considerable [ICON_Faith] Faith near natural beauty. With Guildhouse building, they can receive unique bonuses from the guild that their leader is in. For Princess Kokkoro, the easist victory paths are Religious or Culture Victories, since they have bonus [ICON_Faith] Faith to buy Apostles and Mikos of Ameth.
This unit heals every turn even after moving or combat in high appeal tiles.
+{1_num} [ICON_Food] Food from the adjacent Tundra {1_Num : plural 1?tile; other?tiles;}.
